title: In and out
body: Get some sensitive document from a secret facility in deep mountains.

title: Find a weak spot
body: We need some info on our competitor.

title: Goodbye Mr. Vice President
body: He knows too much and prevents us from acting, so we need him removed - permanently.

title: Times are changing
body: The old communist regime must make way for the new market forces.

title: Under the city streets
body: One of our agents is held by a mysterious sect deep in ancient catacombs, we need him rescued.
